languages.text: "Перед угрозой ереси ксеносы показались мне приемлемыми союзниками. Такие случаи уже бывали, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Перед угрозой ереси ксеносы показались мне приемлемыми союзниками. Такие случаи уже бывали, не так ли?"

languages.text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"
languages.original_text: "Перед угрозой ереси ксеносы показались мне приемлемыми союзниками. Такие случаи уже бывали, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"
"In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"
"In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"
"In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"
"In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

languages.text: 「異端に直面したとき、異種族は私との同盟を受け入れたようだった。本件に前例はないのだな？」
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: 「異端に直面したとき、異種族は私との同盟を受け入れたようだった。本件に前例はないのだな？」

languages.text: “和异端分子相比，异形似乎是可以接受的盟友。和异形结盟是有先例的，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: “和异端分子相比，异形似乎是可以接受的盟友。和异形结盟是有先例的，是吧？”

languages.text: «Ante la herejía, los xenos parecían aliados aceptables. Hay precedente para estas decisiones, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: «Ante la herejía, los xenos parecían aliados aceptables. Hay precedente para estas decisiones, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: « Pour combattre l'hérésie, même les xénos me paraissent des alliés acceptables. En outre, n'y a-t-il pas des précédents ? »
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour combattre l'hérésie, même les xénos me paraissent des alliés acceptables. En outre, n'y a-t-il pas des précédents ? »

languages.text: "Angesichts der Ketzerei schienen mir die Xenos akzeptable Verbündete zu sein. Es gab dafür schon Präzedenzfälle, richtig?"
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Angesichts der Ketzerei schienen mir die Xenos akzeptable Verbündete zu sein. Es gab dafür schon Präzedenzfälle, richtig?"

languages.text: "Yüzleşmek zorunda kaldığım şey kâfirlik iken zenolar, kabul edilebilir müttefikler olarak göründüler. Bu ilk kez gerçekleşen bir durum değil, yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "In the face of heresy, the xenos seemed like acceptable allies to me. There have been precedents for this, correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Yüzleşmek zorunda kaldığım şey kâfirlik iken, zenolar kabul edilebilir müttefikler olarak göründüler. Bu ilk kez gerçekleşen bir durum değil, yanılıyor muyum?"
